content: At the top of the stairs, pass through the gate to enter the first courtyard. This large open area sports a large tree with a **Treasure Chest** straight ahead, while a blood trail leads along the main path to the left.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Entrance'.
The content is as follows:
At the top of the stairs, pass through the gate to enter the first courtyard. This large open area sports a large tree with a **Treasure Chest** straight ahead, while a blood trail leads along the main path to the left.
